snippet.title: The Campsite - Trailer (Itch.io)
snippet.description:
The Campsite: A short but intense graphic adventure – Available now on itch.io!

"An enthusiastic adventurer is about to embark on a special mission: leading a chaotic team of unruly members in the hunt for a mysterious treasure. A vibrant night in the woods awaits, unveiling a memorable adventure, but beware—the shadows conceal a watchful presence. They are not alone..."

The Campsite is a short, modern point-and-click adventure that retains the spirit of classic graphic adventures. With around 60 minutes of gameplay, it’s perfect for casual players and newcomers alike, offering an accessible and enjoyable experience that’s easy to pick up and play anytime.

Find me on:
Itch.io https://guillemespias.itch.io
X (Twitter) https://x.com/GuillemEspias
Mastodon https://mastodon.social/@guillemespias
Threads https://www.threads.net/@guillemespias
Bluesky https://bsky.app/profile/guillemespias.bsky.social
